data.title: GIORGOS MICHAELIDIS 1965
data.meta_description: Documentary series included interviews with well-known Greek artists about significant periods of their life or their work. The director and writer GIORGOS MICHAELIDIS, in the programme “THE STORY OF MY TIMES” describes the founding of the first regional theatre in GREECE in the year 1965, named “THEATRE OF NEA IONIA”.
data.text: Documentary series included interviews with well-known Greek artists about significant periods of their life or their work. The director and writer GIORGOS MICHAELIDIS, in the programme “THE STORY OF MY TIMES” describes the founding of the first regional theatre in GREECE in the year 1965, named “THEATRE OF NEA IONIA”.
